posts.post_content:
T205 Mathewson.  $325 delivered. SOLD

The card now resides in an SGC 30 holder, but I have been unable to scan it in the holder because my HP all-in-one printer is apparently on sabbatical.  The little bastard is spewing out error messages left and right.

The card has a wrinkle/crease that runs from his left ear to just above his hat that is not visible in the scan.  A 2nd crease that runs between the "G" and "I" in Giants is somewhat visible in the scan.  I suppose due to the dark color of the card, neither crease detracts much from the card's beauty.

my email:  [url]boboinnes33@gmail.com[/url]

Anthony, e-mail send.
Looking for a T205 Mathewson.
Thanks, Brian
